segments.text: We've settled price , order , payment , now I am calling to ask about package . How can we pack the goods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a rule , we use cardboard boxes for outer packing . Besides , I would like to make it clear that each piece of computer will be dismantled into several parts before shipment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mean that we are responsible for putting them together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . As you know , that's the common practice for exporting computer . This can avoid some damages on computers in the process of transportation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Why not use wooden cases ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you prefer wooden cases , we will provide them . But cardboard boxes are light , less expensive , and more convenient to handle in the course of packing and unpacking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I know . Does it mean that shipment will have to be delayed if I insist on using wooden cases ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps . That will be more complicated , if we use wooden boxes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you may use cardboard boxes for outer packing so long as you can guarantee the safety of the computers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is guaranteed . Each box is lined with foam plastic in order to prevent damage by air , water or stress . Besides , cardboard boxes will be secured together on wood pallets by overall metal strapping .
segments.speaker: S2
